name: AimGoGoGo
description:
AimGoGoGo is a game for improving your aim in FPS games. It supports a lot of popular FPS games. More than 50 weapons and lots of training courses.
It can help you practice recoil control of each weapon and Tracking in FPS Game and Improve your muscle memory.

Key Features:
You can set properties to adjust the robot behavior.
.
You can set properties to adjust the robot and player's attributes(Speed, Max HP, Jump Height, etc...)
Built-in Scene Editor for creating your own scene.
.
15 lessons of training.
Track your stats to show your improvement.
Built-in sensitivity converters for a lot of popular FPS games
Advanced crosshair options.
